title: I've PIXEL2XL under 2 year warranty but a pink vertical just came up randomly. Pls help asap. Repair
content:
I've a Pixel 2 xl and it's still under 2 year warranty but my display is not working properly and yesterday a pink vertical line just popped out of nowhere. I want to get it repaired as soon as possible. 
I've tried restarting, opened in safe mode, changed developer options, tried calling customer service but no response.
Please help and contact me as soon as possible.
